parameters.name: DBClusterId
parameters.description:
The ID of the AnalyticDB for MySQL Data Warehouse Edition (V3.0) cluster.

>  You can call the [DescribeDBClusters](~~129857~~) operation to query the cluster IDs of all AnalyticDB for MySQL Data Warehouse Edition (V3.0) clusters within a specific region.

parameters.name: GroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: GroupUser
parameters.description: The database account with which to associate the resource group. It can be a standard account or a privileged account.
